description:
Selected countries of residence

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45412 Monthly tourism survey

Definition:
The monthly tourism survey records the country of residence
of the guests in accommodation establishments. As a rule,
the country of residence of a guest is the country of
permanent or usual residence. The guest's citizenship or
nationality does not play a role.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Selected countries of residence
